definitions.definition: To fit one or more shims to a piece of machinery.
To adjust something by using shims.
To adjust the homogeneity of a magnetic field, after the mechanical devices once used for the purpose.
To intercept and modify calls to (an API ), usually for compatibility purposes.

main_definition: To fit one or more shims to a piece of machinery.
secondary_definitions: To adjust something by using shims.
To adjust the homogeneity of a magnetic field, after the mechanical devices once used for the purpose.
( computing , transitive ) To intercept and modify calls to (an API ), usually for compatibility purposes.
